sentences: Chata (茶太, born November 21, 1979) is a Japanese singer who has performed theme songs for video games and anime series.
Chata began dabbling in music in 1998.
She used to participate in writing lyrics on Niftyserve's forum for Original MIDI music.
In March 2007, she collaborated with composer Yoko Shimomura and released her first major debut album, Murmur.
In the same year, she performed the ending theme for the anime television series Potemayo, which first broadcast in July.
They once formed the group Shimochamin, and from December 2006 to June 2007 the three of them hosted the internet radio show Harechatta Utatane Biyori.
